t: Kar's Nuts - Wikipedia
s: October 9, 2023 - Kar's Nuts is an American brand of nut and snack items that is headquartered in Madison Heights, Michigan. Kar's Nuts, originally located in Detroit, was incorporated in 1939 from a business that had been distributing nut and snack items throughout Michigan since 1933.
